titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the Jared J. Chambers photographic portrait V1997.090
titlestmt.author: John Zarrillo

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on 2023-08-21 11:12:39 +0000.
profiledesc.langusage: Description is written in: English, Latin script.

did.abstract: One photographic portrait of Jared J. Chambers, President of the 28th Ward Taxpayers' Protection Association, 1941.

bioghist.head: Biographical note
bioghist.p: Jared J. Chambers was born in Massachusetts, around 1854. A longtime resident of Brooklyn, he was actively involved in the community as a member of the Republican Party, and served as president of the 28th Ward Taxpayer's Protection Association for 38 years. He died, in Brooklyn, in 1942.
- Based on obituary, Brooklyn Daily Eagle, 19 October 1942

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: Photograph is presumed to be in the public domain by 2062.

acqinfo.head: Immediate Source of Acquisition
acqinfo.p: Immediate souce of acquisition is unknown. Photograph was accessioned in 1997.

relatedmaterial.head: Related Materials
relatedmaterial.p: For additional portraits please see BHS's Portrait Collection.
